publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1899 Ms Margo MacDonald: American Strategic Missile Defence System—That the Parliament urges Her Majesty’s Government to use the opportunity afforded by the American President’s stated intention to consult America’s allies on his administration’s implementation of the Strategic Missile Defence System to support the UN Secretary General’s opposition to this profoundly dangerous policy which will destabilize international and intercontinental relations whilst remaining impotent in dealing with regional and internal conflicts across the world.
S1M-1899 American Strategic Missile Defence System (lodged on 2 May 2001) Michael Matheson*

S1M-1899 Ms Margo MacDonald: American Strategic Missile Defence System—That the Parliament urges Her Majesty’s Government to use the opportunity afforded by the American President’s stated intention to consult America’s allies on his administration’s implementation of the Strategic Missile Defence System to support the UN Secretary General’s opposition to this profoundly dangerous policy which will destabilize international and intercontinental relations whilst remaining impotent in dealing with regional and internal conflicts across the world. Supported by: Michael Matheson
S1M-1899 American Strategic Missile Defence System (lodged on 2 May 2001) Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*, Robin Harper*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-1899 American Strategic Missile Defence System (lodged on 2 May 2001) Robert Brown*
S1M-1899 American Strategic Missile Defence System (lodged on 2 May 2001) Brian Adam*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Gil Paterson*

S1M-1899 Ms Margo MacDonald: American Strategic Missile Defence System—That the Parliament urges Her Majesty’s Government to use the opportunity afforded by the American President’s stated intention to consult America’s allies on his administration’s implementation of the Strategic Missile Defence System to support the UN Secretary General’s opposition to this profoundly dangerous policy which will destabilize international and intercontinental relations whilst remaining impotent in dealing with regional and internal conflicts across the world. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, Tommy Sheridan, Robert Brown, Brian Adam, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Alex Neil*
S1M-1899 American Strategic Missile Defence System (lodged on 2 May 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*

S1M-1899 Ms Margo MacDonald: American Strategic Missile Defence System—That the Parliament urges Her Majesty’s Government to use the opportunity afforded by the American President’s stated intention to consult America’s allies on his administration’s implementation of the Strategic Missile Defence System to support the UN Secretary General’s opposition to this profoundly dangerous policy which will destabilize international and intercontinental relations whilst remaining impotent in dealing with regional and internal conflicts across the world. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, Tommy Sheridan, Robert Brown, Brian Adam, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Linda Fabiani
S1M-1899 American Strategic Missile Defence System (lodged on 2 May 2001) Fiona McLeod*
